title: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it doesn't take focus. It only takes focus if I drop down the combo list.
EB: When clicking on the first Combo, it should take focus regardless of whether the combo list is dropped down or not.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog.
2. Press the 'Tab' key.
3. Verify that the focus goes to the second Combo 'Repository Path:'.
